name: Crispy Chicken Tenderloins
linkName: 15 SIMPLE Recipes that will make you WANT an AIR FRYER! â†’ What to Make in Your Air Fryer
notes: Create more breadcrumb mixture than you need and place it in a separate container. That saves time putting the ingredients together. You can be creative with the spices and add any others that you think appropriate. I prefer chicken tenderloins to chicken breasts since they are less tough and smaller. Reheat from fridge using Air Fryer for 3 minutes to keep them crisp.

instructions.description: Create Breadcrumb + Spices Mixture (mix thoroughly, and place in separate container for multiple meals). Use * ingredients.
Create Marinate Liquid. 1/2 cup of buttermik or 1/2 tbsp of white vinegar then enough milk to make 1/2 cup.
Place the chicken tenderloins or breast tenders (1 lb unfrozen packaged, approximately 7-12 pieces) into a bowl drenched in the marinate liquid.
Let marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
Place enough breadcrumb mixture on a plate and coat the chicken with the breadcrumbs
Place chicken in fryer bucket, spraying chicken & bucket with olive oil
Airfryer: Preheat airfryer to 400 F (maybe 1 minute for the Instant Pot)
Place about 4 chicken pieces in fryer bucket.
Cook at 370 F for 12 minutes, flipping chicken half way through.
When done make sure the temperature of chicken is 170 F.
Repeat with the remaining chicken tenderloins
